creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
markings: red artist's toshidama seal, censor seals: 濱 {Hama}, 衣笠 {Kinugasa}; publisher's seal:  や {Ya}
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
text: Related to the play Goban Tadanobu yuki no nachiguro 碁盤忠信雪黒石, performed at the Ichimura Theater in the 11th month of 1848.
title: Actors Nakamura Utaemon IV as Igami no Gonta and Bandō Shuka I as his Wife Kosen
